name: The Mech Republic
description:
Hello and welcome to the Mech Republic — a special place where every robot end its life cycle. Feel free to walk and jump for a while as you will inevitably fall to eternity.

The game was made during Ludum Dare 35 as a 48h compo entry. If you liked it, please rate it and leave a comment here: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-35/?action=p...

How to play:

1. STAY ON THE PLATFORM!
2. [Don't] listen to AI jokes
3. Every mistake will anger the AI

Controls:

1. To move the robot, use WSAD or arrow keys
2. Press space to perform a jump
3. Use Q and E keys to rotate the camera
